txt.en:
'It seems not long ago that you stood there before me asking me how you get your hand on an Orc-cleaver like mine; all wide-eyed and timid in awe of this incredible specimen. Now look at you, a veteran in your own right, capable of standing with me - well, near me anyway, as I look down from on high at all the other new recruits looking to make their mark here in the Ettenmoors. 

'You were scared like they are; we were all scared, but that doesn't mean we are cowards. We can face down the Orcs, and the spiders, and Wargs and even the uruks, we can take them and now you can look good killing them.

'The Captain-Generals have seen fit to make some new cloaks for you all. All you need to do is choose and the cloak is yours. The Captain-Generals have limited the supply and I cannot hand too many out, so you should act quickly.'
'Looks like you have come back to make a decision. So, what is it going to be?'
Veterans of the Battle of the Ettenmoors

As a reward for the efforts of the most recognized, noble and persistent in the Ettenmoors, the Captain-Generals have commissioned a set of cloaks to be made and distributed to those who have achieved the rank of Lieutenant and better.
Speak to Ash at Gl√¢n Vraig
Speak with Quartermaster Ash again and choose your reward for your continued efforts in the Ettenmoors.
You must choose your reward before 11/1/11
